General.Name: Jiangling Motors Corp Ltd
General.Description: Jiangling Motors Corporation, Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and sale of automobiles and automobile parts in China and internationally. It offers commercial vehicles, SUVs, and related components, which include JMC brand light trucks, pickups, light buses, Yusheng brand SUVs, Ford brand light buses, MPVs and other commercial vehicles, and SUV products. The company also produces and sells engines, castings, and other components. In addition, it offers maintenance services. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Nanchang, China.
General.Address: No. 2111, Yingbin Middle Avenue, Nanchang, China, 330200
